article_title: Their View: Affordable Care Act to be big factor in 2016 election cycle
article_text: By The League of Women Voters

article_metadata.description: On June 25, a 6-3 Supreme Court majority ruled in King v. Burwell that tax subsidies under the Affordable Care Act could be available nationwide, both for citizens living in states with insurance exchanges as well as the 34 states (including Illinois) relying on the federal exchange.The decision revolved around the intent of a statement in the legislation that premium subsidies be available through exchanges “established by the state.” If the decision had gone the other way,
article_metadata.author: The League of Women Voters
